text: A supreme leader or supreme ruler is a title used by many dictators or rulers of countries who have full power over the government. Supreme leader may refer to: * Adolf Hitler () in Germany * Benito Mussolini () in Italy * Emperor of Japan (, ) in Japan * Joseph Stalin (, ) in the Soviet Union * Supreme leader of North Korea (, ) * Paramount leader of China () * General secretaries of communist parties in communist states * Supreme Leader of Iran (, )
title: Supreme leader
